arts.ttl: Alex Iwobi scores twice as Fulham march past Brighton
arts.sum: Alex Iwobi scored twice as Fulham marched into the top half of the Premier League with a win over Brighton at Craven Cottage. The Cottagers were pegged back after Iwobi’s quickfire opener by Carlos Baleba’s fine strike early in the second half. But Matt O’Riley’s own goal gifted them the lead again and Iwobi hit his second to ensure Brighton have still never beaten Fulham in the Premier League. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: 'Won't happen again' - Brighton boss Fabian Hurzeler reacts to crucial goalkeeper Bart Verbruggen error against Fulham
arts.sum: Fabian Hurzeler spoke to the press about goalkeeper Bart Vebruggen’s mistake in the opening minutes of their away fixture against Fulham.

arts.ttl: Brighton boss Fabian Hurzeler says 'we didn't deserve to lose' after loss against Fulham
arts.sum: The Albion head coach summed up his side’s 3-1 loss away to Fulham on Thursday, December 5.

arts.ttl: Silva issues plea to Fulham fans
arts.sum: Fulham reaction. The post Silva issues plea to Fulham fans appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: We are going to push ourselves – Marco Silva wants even more from Fulham
arts.sum: The Cottagers moved up to sixth with a 3-1 win against Brighton.

arts.ttl: 'Big victory' for Fulham against Brighton - Silva
arts.sum: Fulham boss Marco Silva says his side's victory over Brighton was a "big victory" as the Cottagers inflicted just a third Premier League defeat of the season on the Seagulls.

arts.ttl: Brighton upset by Fulham blocking Dunk - Hurzeler
arts.sum: Brighton boss Fabian Hurzeler says his side were upset by Fulham's blocking of Lewis Dunk in the build-up to the Cottagers' second goal during the Seagulls' defeat on Thursday.

arts.ttl: Brighton player ratings against Fulham: one 4 after gifted goal
Fulham 3-1 Brighton: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Alex Iwobi nets brace in Premier League clash
arts.sum: Fulham move into sixth position in the Premier League table courtesy of a 3-1 victory over Brighton & Hove Albion, with Alex Iwobi hitting a brace for Marco Silva's side.

arts.ttl: Alex Iwobi brace gives Fulham victory over Brighton
arts.sum: The Cottagers were pegged back after Iwobi’s quickfire opener by Carlos Baleba’s fine strike early in the second half.
